Here are some placeholder bullet points:

-   I was born in the North of England, specifically an ex-mining town.
-   I completed my Master of Mathematics (Hons) with an industrial placement year at the Department of Health at the University of Bath and graduated with First Class Honours.

-   I started my PhD at the University of California Irvine in September of 2020.
-   I will be graduating from UCI in September.
